title.main: AI is not here to replace us, but to

paragraphs: At Laburen, we believe people should focus on what truly matters.
Artificial Intelligence is here to free your time, boost your ideas, and open new opportunities for your business to grow and evolve.
Our mission is simple: make AI agents accessible to everyone.
It shouldn't be a privilege for a few tech giants, but a real tool for entrepreneurs, businesses, and companies that want to transform the way they work.

paragraphs.text: We believe in a more human and innovative world, where technology has one clear purpose:

paragraphs: That's the commitment that drives us. That's the heart of Laburen.
content.footer: Every revolution starts with a Shovel, like ours.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Laburen, our technology, and how it can help you transform the way you work.

questions.question: What is Laburen.com?
questions.answer: Laburen.com creates AI Employees â€” intelligent assistants that automate sales, customer support, logistics, and business operations. Unlike traditional chatbots, our AI Employees learn, adapt, and improve over time.

questions.question: What's the difference between an AI Employee and a regular chatbot?
questions.answer: AI Employees are advanced virtual workers that learn from your data, understand context, and improve over time. Unlike basic chatbots that follow scripts, they can handle complex conversations, make decisions, and integrate with your business systems.

questions.question: What tasks can AI Employees handle?
questions.answer: AI Employees can manage customer support, process sales inquiries, schedule appointments, handle logistics coordination, provide product recommendations, and automate repetitive business processes across multiple channels.

questions.question: Is Laburen.com secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we prioritize security with enterprise-grade encryption, secure data handling, and compliance with industry standards. Your data is protected and never shared with third parties.

questions.question: Does it integrate with other platforms?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Laburen integrates with popular platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, CRM systems, calendars, email, and many business tools to create seamless workflows across your existing tech stack.

questions.question: Do AI Employees improve over time?
questions.answer: Yes, our AI Employees continuously learn from interactions, feedback, and new data to provide better responses and more accurate assistance. They become more effective as they gain experience with your business.

questions.question: Can they handle multiple conversations at once?
questions.answer: Yes, AI Employees can manage unlimited simultaneous conversations across different channels, ensuring no customer inquiry goes unanswered while maintaining personalized interactions.

questions.question: How do I get started with Laburen.com?
questions.answer: Getting started is simple! Sign up for a free account, choose your plan, create your first AI Employee using our intuitive interface, and start automating your business processes immediately.

testimonials.title: Companies around the world are already hiring AI Agents with Laburen.com

items.body: With Laburen we managed to automate customer service on WhatsApp and improve our sales instantly. Now our human agents focus on closing sales.

usage.title: How companies use Laburen
usage.subtitle: From startups to large corporations, Laburen adapts to any industry: ecommerce, healthcare, logistics, real estate, and more.

tao.title: Education Without Delays
tao.description: With AI, TAO handles thousands of student queries in real time, cutting 70% of manual tasks. More focus on teaching, less on repetitive work.

cargo.title: Seamless Logistics
cargo.description: Automated tracking and quotes save hours of work each week. Instant answers for clients and a faster, more efficient team.

vias3d.title: Leads That Come on Their Own
vias3d.description: AI tripled their qualified leads without growing the team. Prospecting is now automatic, and sales move faster than ever.

europie.title: Healthcare With More Human Time
europie.description: Automated scheduling and less admin work. With AI, the team spends more time where it matters: caring for patients.

heroCta.title: Is your business ready for the next level
heroCta.description: AI can be the competitive edge your organization needs. With Laburen Enterprise, we design AI Agents tailored to your goals, teams, and processes â€” bringing more efficiency, more impact, and more time for what really matters.

nvidia.title: Innovation validated by NVIDIA:
paragraphs: Being part of NVIDIA Inception is a global recognition that validates Laburen.com as one of the startups with the greatest projection in Artificial Intelligence.

It's not just about belonging to a program: it means being evaluated and backed by NVIDIA's technical team, who identified in us real innovation, scalability, and a practical approach to solving business challenges. What sets us apart â€” and caught NVIDIA's attention â€” is our ability to retrain Large Language Models (LLMs) for specific industries.

We don't work with generic AI: we adapt it to the language of each business, with the technological power driving today's global leaders. With NVIDIA as our ally, our AI agents don't just scale â€” they become engines of transformation for companies worldwide.

microsoft.intro: Laburen Enterprise: scaling AI into new markets.
paragraphs: Joining the Microsoft for Startups network opened the door to a global ecosystem of innovation. This isn't just a partnership; it's the opportunity to build with greater reach, speed, and security â€” backed by the infrastructure and tools of one of the world's most influential tech companies.
With Laburen Enterprise as a key partner, we deliver scalable AI solutions that drive transformation across industries and regions, turning promise into competitive advantage.
